sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_app_application"> <sys_app_application action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>false</active> <category display_value="Custom Applications">e0355b31ef303000a61d5a3615c0fb78</category> <description>Code Search Groups and Tables are the main way to configure how your developers can find strings of code within various tables in your instance. Scoped applications can ship their own Search Groups, optimized for searching the tables and records used in that application. By defining a Search Group and Search Tables, you are letting developers know where the important scriptable parts of your application can be found.</description> <device_type>browser</device_type> <hint>Code Search Groups and Tables</hint> <name/> <order>5000</order> <roles>admin</roles> <sys_class_name>sys_app_application</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-09-30 20:16:55</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>794009cad7320200b6bddb0c82520311</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Code Search</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Code Search" source="sn_codesearch">f9752f20d7120200b6bddb0c8252032e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Code Search">f9752f20d7120200b6bddb0c8252032e</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_app_application_794009cad7320200b6bddb0c82520311</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-09-30 20:16:55</sys_updated_on> <title>Code Search</title> <view_name/> </sys_app_application> </record_update>
